description: Housed within the Tiberio hotel not far from the famous piazzetta, this elegant restaurant boasts a charming terrace with spectacular views of the rooftops of Capri. The skilful chef prepares creative dishes with a focus on ingredients from Campania, as well as delicious bread including a tempting “casatiello” (a savoury bread from Naples). Lighter options are available at lunchtime.
